thanks Yan, that helps alot. the newcomers are the ones with the 
names of mythological gods am I right?

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Ok, to solve all the confusion:
> 
> Perndabot is just leaving the Alliance base. He's still kinda at 
it, waiting 
> for BrightBlade to follow him. Megatron and Ramhorn are fighting at 
the Ark. 
> I think Ripper is helping Ramhorn. The other battle is at the 
Cybertronian 
> Fire, where the Predacon forces and the Newcomers are being whooped 
on by the 
> Maximals and their base.
> 
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster looks at Hot Rod, nodding. "Follow me," he says, running 
off toward 
> the ship.
